> "The ark=
 will be well guarded for a while... unless we find

 from himself "Go to

Rodimus jumped as Hy=
dras gave him the command to go to Perceptor, he
had not quite expected tha=
t but he nodded, "Of course." he said.
Transforming back into the vehicular=
 mode, Rodimus quickly left the
room.

> and looking to the bots presents i=
n the room "I'll need
> a new security chief, Perceptor will have too much =
work
> to do... but who?"

Cyclonus watched Hydras as he attempted to choos=
e a new security
chief. He was still not sure of Hydras, a being who was th=
e fusion of
the Galvatron he knew, but also of a Megatron that he did not.
=
Sometime he saw Galvatron in Hydras' attitude, but then sometimes
something=
 else. He frowned, not sure if he were willing to do this,
yet for part of =
him it felt right.

"Yess" Skorponok said, cutting through Cyclonus' silenc=
e as he stepped
forward, "Perceptor will have much to do. I will keep your =
base
secure."

Scourge glanced at the massive Skorponok, not sure what to m=
ake of
him, although his first instinct was not to trust him.

"No." Cyclon=
us' said, finally speaking. "I will."

Skorponok glanced at Cyclonus frowni=
ng, anger stretching itself across
his face.
